original_text: And you shall take possession of the land and settle in it, for I have given the land to you to possess it.
korean_text: 그 땅을 점령하여 거기 거주하라 내가 그 땅을 너희 소유로 너희에게 주었음이라

sentences.original_text: And you shall take possession of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 땅을 차지하게 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: for I have given the land to you
